column5: Tôi nói tiếng Việt. Yo Hablo Espanol  Apartment with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, both of them are listed on Airbnb. Basic amenities with everything you need.  You’ll find plenty of other local sites, activities and attractions to explore such as: Arlington Museum of Art, Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport, Maverick Stadium, Arlington Municipal Airport and more.  My place is suitable for:  - Couples   - Young Adventures   - Entrepreneurs   - Business travelers   - Family visiting
column8: 1 mile to AT&T Stadium - Local experience :)
